title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Obesity
purpose: To generate a public policy environment where obesity is recognised and prioritised; hold government to account for the delivery of an obesity strategy; call for joined up commissioning that addresses obesity and delivers value for money; and use parliamentary means to provide focus across key elements of the pathway.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: Swans Centre for Innovation, Station Rd, Wallsend, NE28 6HJ. Tel: 0191 234 2493.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Jak Nagy, Healthcomms Consulting Ltd. Tel: 07759 276999
contact_details.secretariat: Healthcomms Consulting Ltd acts as the group's secretariat.https://www.healthcommsconsulting.co.uk/

detailed_benefits.Description: Healthcomms Consulting Ltd paid by Slimming World, Eli Lilly, and Numan to act as the group's secretariat. From : 09/10/2024 To  : 08/10/2025
